children.name: spacecommz.io is committed to protecting the privacy of our users and ensuring the highest level of security for their personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines our practices concerning the collection, use, and sharing of your personal data when you use our services and explains your privacy rights under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
spacecommz.io is the data controller responsible for your personal information that is collected through our services. Our contact details are provided at the end of this policy.

We collect information that identifies you as an individual or that can be used to identify or contact you (“Personal Data”). This includes, but is not limited to, your name, email address, IP address, and any other data that you choose to provide us through the use of our services.
We use your Personal Data for the following purposes:
• To provide and maintain our services
To provide and maintain our services
• To communicate with you, including providing customer support and sending you service-related updates
To communicate with you, including providing customer support and sending you service-related updates
• To enhance the security of our services
To enhance the security of our services
We process your Personal Data under the following legal bases:
• Your consent, which you can withdraw at any time
Your consent, which you can withdraw at any time
• The necessity to perform a contract with you
The necessity to perform a contract with you
• Our legitimate business interests, such as improving our services and preventing fraud
Our legitimate business interests, such as improving our services and preventing fraud
We share your Personal Data with selected third parties, including:
• Service providers who perform services on our behalf, such as payment processing and data analysis
Service providers who perform services on our behalf, such as payment processing and data analysis
• Subprocessors, like livekit.io, who assist us in providing our services
Subprocessors, like livekit.io, who assist us in providing our services
As part of our commitment to transparency, below is a list of subprocessors we currently use:
• Livekit.io: Provides real-time video and audio communication services.
Livekit.io: Provides real-time video and audio communication services.
• Cloudflare: Hostting of Frontend Services, domain managment and email.
Cloudflare: Hostting of Frontend Services, domain managment and email.
• Render.com : Hosting of Database with Customer Data and Backend Services
Render.com : Hosting of Database with Customer Data and Backend Services
Under GDPR, you have the following data protection rights:
• The right to access, update, or delete your personal information
The right to access, update, or delete your personal information
• The right to object to the processing of your personal information
The right to object to the processing of your personal information
• The right to request that we limit the processing of your personal information
The right to request that we limit the processing of your personal information
• The right to withdraw consent at any time
The right to withdraw consent at any time

We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to ensure a level of security appropriate to the risk, including safeguards to protect against unauthorized or unlawful processing, accidental loss, destruction, or damage to your Personal Data.

Your Personal Data may be transferred to, and processed in, countries other than the country in which you reside. We will take all steps reasonably necessary to ensure that your data is treated securely and in accordance with this Privacy Policy.
We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.
If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
